statements: SELECT * FROM patients_data;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients_data WHERE gender='M';
SELECT * FROM patients_data WHERE blood_type='AB+';
SELECT patient_name, height, weight FROM patients_data ORDER BY height DESC, weight ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, blood_type FROM patients_data WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, height, weight FROM patients_data WHERE blood_type LIKE 'A%' AND height > 170
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, blood_type, age FROM patients_data WHERE weight < 70 AND gender = 'F'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, blood_type, height, weight FROM patients_data ORDER BY weight ASC, height DESC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_height > 160;
SELECT patient_id, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_weight < 70;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female' AND patient_height > 170;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_weight FROM patients WHERE patient_age < 40;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_height > 160 AND patient_weight < 70;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_height, patient_weight FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 25 AND patient_height > 170 OR patient_weight < 60 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, dob FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients, Visits WHERE Patients.patient_id = Visits.patient_id;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications;
SELECT * FROM Medications WHERE medication_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT v.patient_id, p.patient_name, v.diagnosis FROM Visits v INNER JOIN Patients p ON v.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE v.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT m.medication_name, m.dosage, m.frequency FROM Medications m INNER JOIN Visits v ON m.visit_id = v.visit_id WHERE v.visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY m.medication_name ASC;
SELECT p.patient_name, COUNT(v.visit_id) AS total_visits FROM Patients p LEFT JOIN Visits v ON p.patient_id = v.patient_id GROUP BY p.patient_name HAVING total_visits >= 3 ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment_date FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id=101 ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT condition_name, diagnosis_date, treatment_status FROM HealthConditions WHERE patient_id=201 AND treatment_status='Ongoing';
SELECT patient_id, MAX(sign_value) AS max_sign_value FROM VitalSigns GROUP BY patient_id HAVING max_sign_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, HealthConditions.condition_name FROM Patients JOIN HealthConditions ON Patients.patient_id = HealthConditions.patient_id WHERE HealthConditions.treatment_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT AVG(sign_value) AS avg_sign_value, MAX(sign_value) AS max_sign_value FROM VitalSigns WHERE sign_type='Blood Pressure';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT visit_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM Visits WHERE visit_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT result_id, test_name, result_value FROM LabResults WHERE result_value > 100;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM Patients JOIN Visits ON Patients.patient_id = Visits.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT test_name, result_value FROM LabResults WHERE result_value > 100 ORDER BY result_value ASC;
